summary: Completed comprehensive testing of WebSocket notification system integration. All core functionality verified including real-time pipeline updates, notification center UI, and Socket.IO connectivity.
passed_tests: Backend health check shows websocket: active
All 21 backend API endpoints working (100% success rate)
Home dashboard loads with NotificationCenter component
Notification bell icon visible and functional in navbar
Ask AI page functions with real-time pipeline status updates
Pipeline status updates display in real-time (Routing → Drafting → Verifying → Delivered)
Notification system receives and displays notifications
User menu and logout functionality working
